title: Stadion NŠC Stjepan Spajić
text: Stadion NŠC Stjepan Spajić is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in the "Siget" neighborhood of <a href="Zagreb">Zagreb</a>, <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>. It was built in 2000 and serves as home stadium for the <a href="NK%20Hrvatski%20Dragovoljac">NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac</a> football club. The stadium has an all seater capacity of 5,000 spectators. It is named after the late club president Stjepan Spajić.
